alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin Valley; Madison River Valley; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 26 at 6:09AM MDT until October 26 at 6:00PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches. * WHERE...Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft, Gallatin Valley, Madison River Valley, and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact this morning`s commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1 or visiting the MDT Road Report website.

area.areaDesc: Beaverhead and Western Madison below 6000ft; Gallatin Valley; Madison River Valley; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
